Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Naga agitation has resulted in animals running rampant across the area.

Slay {@LinkCreature:10#20#frillfang sabertooths}, {@LinkCreature:10#4#lumbering kamaras}, {@LinkCreature:10#7#vicious mycanars}, and {@LinkCreature:10#9#longtusk slashers}.

Report to Coordinator Briale when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
